metadata.title: CVE-2021-32475 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ID numbers displayed in the quiz grading report required additionalsanitizing to prevent a stored XSS risk. Moodle 3.10 to 3.10.3, 3.9 to3.9.6, 3.8 to 3.8.8, 3.5 to 3.5.17 and earlier unsupported versions areaffected.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
